name: War With Meme ROLL!
description:
In this game you have to shoot enemies with your gun!, OR ENEMY WILL MAKE YOU DIE! Game Trailers: DOWNLOAD NOW! Available For Android 4.4 to Android 11 #About This Game# I made this game to fill the confusion of the developer who is idle and doesn't move at all LOL... BTW I made a devlog of this game, so if you want to watch the devlog, watch here (Indonesian Language Video) :

The editor is still working, wait a few more hours/days :)
